service_name: Government Miniserver Community Cloud (Official over PSN) Monthly
page_content:
Memset Ltd

Government Miniserver Community Cloud (Official over PSN) Monthly

Memset's ISO27001 accredited Government Miniserver Community Cloud provide flexible and cost-effective access to highly secure, high performance, reliable, scalable IaaS virtual machines capable of handling OFFICIAL data hosted in our UK data centres. Award-winning open source based cloud infrastructure backed by 24x7x365 operations, industry-leading 99.95% uptime SLA.

Features

  • Community Cloud for exclusive use of UK Public Sector customers
  • Enterprise-grade N+1 UK data centres with industry-leading SLAs
  • A 24x7x365 operations team
  • Choice of operating system: Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS or Microsoft
  • Self or Memset managed virtual firewalls and load-balancers available
  • Patrol™ Suite intrusion detection and vulnerability scanning available
  • Self-managed, infrastructure-assisted or managed-platform (24x7x365 support) SLA's
  • 24x7x365 hardware & availability monitoring included
  • Operational SSDs for high performance ideal for high-throughput requirements
  • Snapshot functionality for disaster recovery, rapid deployment or clustering

Benefits

  • Upload or configure your own base images
  • Pre-configured virtual machines in a range of OS flavours
  • Industry-leading low prices
  • Ultimate control: Root/administrator, Web-based control panel and MemShell
  • 24x7x365 hardware & availability monitoring included
  • 99.95% uptime guarantee with multi-homed network
  • CESG/PGA reviewed: can be used to host OFFICIAL information
  • Easy deployment via out portal or API
  • Green: one of the lowest carbon footprint computing platforms

Pricing

£11.95 per virtual machine per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial option available
